php.LBL_SAVE_SEND_MAIL: Do you want to save a sent email?
php.LBL_SAVE_SEND_MAIL_INFO: All sent emails are not saved (Gmail saves them automatically, so there is no need to enable this option). In order to save emails, enter an additional configuration.
php.LBL_VALIDATE_CERT: Do you want to validate the certificate?
php.LBL_INDIVIDUAL_DELIVERY_INFO: Emails will be sent individually for each recipient
php.LBL_UNSUBSCRIBE_INFO:
The List-Unsubscribe header is an optional email header you can add to your messages. It allows subscribers to see an unsubscribe button they can click if they would like to automatically stop receiving your email. The list of parameters that will be placed in the header in angle brackets, e.g. < ... >
example: mailto:newsletter@yetiforce.com >>> <mailto:newsletter@yetiforce.com>
php.LBL_NO_EMAIL_TEMPLATE: There is no default email template
php.LBL_SAVE_BEFORE_VERIFYING_CONNECTION: You must save before verifying your connection.
php.LBL_REDIRECT_URI_ID_DESC:
Webservices for OAuth are listed here.
 You must first add the key to the appropriate application in a separate panel. This will generate a URI that will be listed in this field.
